name: Singularity (itch) (pemdora, RomainDnnn, LeandreRenouard, Benjouille)
description:
The game 

For a better experience windows executable version is recommended.

(Brackeys Game Jam #3)

Play as a lonely black hole lost in the infinite space. Some of the dialogues are missing but we hope that we can fix it after the jam submission.

Controls

Move the Black hole with the mouse 

Press Space to talk

Credits :

Romain Dannin : Narrative & Game Designer

Benjamin Morelle :  Gameplay Programmer

Léandre Renouard : Art director

Tara Zhong :  Gameplay Programmer & Game Designer
